poha.description:
The interview was recorded on January 29, 2004 with Nicolas ʻAbdū Ziyādah, male, born in 1907 in Damascus, Syria. He was a professor at al-Kulliyah al-Rashīdīyah, al-Kulliyah al-ʻArabīyah and the American University of Beirut (Lebanon), then a historian.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع نيكولاس عبدو زيادة في 29 كانون الثاني يناير عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1907، في دمشق، سوريا، عمل كأستاذ جامعي في الكلية العربية والكلية الرشيدية ومن ثم كمؤرّخ.
poha.contents: Family history and early life in Damascus. (@ 0:20)||Early life in Palestine . (@ 20:2)||Education in Jerusalem. (@ 47:39)||Employment in Akka (Palestine) . (@ 66:27)||Receiving educational grant and traveling to London. (@ 83:17)||Educational experience at London University. (@ 110:18)||Cultural experience in Germany. (@ 131:16)||London Roundtable Conference, 1939 . (@ 160:9)||Schools and colleges in Palestine. (@ 188:12)||United Nation and the Palestinian cause. (@ 201:51)||Arab armies and Israeli occupation. (@ 216:57)||Intellectual life in Jerusalem. (@ 233:18)||Working in Arabic Radio station. (@ 254:41)||Arabic Radio station. (@ 268:19)||Intellectual life in Palestine and exile. (@ 279:8)||Study and teaching in Palestine during the British Mandate. (@ 297:29)||Renaissance of Palestine and Arab countries. (@ 313:5)||Culture and politics in the Arab world. (@ 330:12)||The meeting with the president Bashār al-Assad. (@ 342:25)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on July 28, 2005 with George Bāsīl Farrāj, male, born in 1924 in Jerusalem, Palestine and resides in Beirut (Lebanon), Lebanon. He worked as a chief secretary of the British high commissioner office during the mandate.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع جورج فراج في 28 تموز يوليو عام 2005، ذكر، ولد عام 1924 في القدس، فلسطين ويقيم في بيروت، لبنان. عمل مديراً لمكتب المفوض السامي البريطاني خلال الانتداب.
poha.contents: Childhood memories in Jerusalem. (@ 0:00)||Socio-economic and political conditions before Nakba. (@ 7:52)||Children's activities in Palestine . (@ 14:2)||Political conditions in Palestine during the British rule. (@ 22:17)||Community celebrations and customs. (@ 27:19)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on December 19, 2003 with Ḥasan Jamāl al-Ḥusaynī, male, born in 1925 in Jerusalem, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع حسن جمال الحسيني في 19 كانون الأول ديسمبر عام 2003، ذكر، ولد عام 1925 في القدس، فلسطين.
poha.contents: Childhood memories in Jerusalem. (@ 0:08)||Palestinian-Jewish relations in pre Nakba Palestine. (@ 10:58)||Revisiting Jerusalem . (@ 27:49)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on July 12, 2005 with Bayān Nuwayhiḍ, female, born in 1937, in Jerusalem, Palestine and resides in Beirut (Lebanon), Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع بيان نويهض في 12 تموز يوليو عام 2005، أنثى، ولدت عام 1937 في القدس، فلسطين وتقيم في بيروت، لبنان.
poha.contents: Political and cultural history of the city. (@ 0:00)||Political turmoil in Jerusalem. (@ 12:44)||War events. (@ 23:57)||Palestinians in exile. (@ 38:46)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on February 16, 2004 with Meli Ḥannā Isḥāq, female, born in 1925 in Jerusalem, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع ملي حنّا إسحاق في 16 شباط 2006 ، أنثى، ولدت عام 1925 في القدس، فلسطين
poha.contents:
Social life in Jerusalem under British mandate. (@ 0:08)||Religious pluralism and social life in Jerusalem
. (@ 12:37)||Socio-political dynamics in Jerusalem during Mandatory Palestine . (@ 22:39)||Conduct of life in pre-Nakba Jerusalem and the expulsion . (@ 41:28)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on August 24, 2004 with Sāmī al-ʻAlamī, male, born in 1924 in Jerusalem, Palestine and resides in Beirut (Lebanon), Lebanon.
He worked as a banker, businessman and university professor in Lebanon, Iraq and Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع سامي العلمي في 24 آب أغسطس عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1924 في القدس، فلسطين ويقيم في بيروت، لبنان. عمل كمصرفي، رجل أعمال وأستاذ محاضر في لبنان، العراق وفلسطين.
poha.contents:
Father's trade and memories. (@ 0:12)||Childhood and schooling in Gaza


. (@ 13:6)||British harassment during the Arab Revolt, 1936-1939. (@ 24:13)||Education at the American University of Beirut (Lebanon). (@ 45:35)||Expulsion from Palestine (@ 61:42)

poha.name_en: Interview with Āminah Muḥammad al-Jabbār (Sārah Cohen) (
poha.name_ar: مقابلة مع آمنة محمد الجبار (سارة كوهين
poha.description:
The interview was recorded on May 29, 1997 with Āminah Muḥammad al-Jabbār (Sārah Cohen), female, born in 1926 in Jerusalem and resides in Beirut (Lebanon), Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع آمنة محمد الجبار (سارة كوهين) في 25 أيار مايو عام 1997، أنثى، ولدت عام 1926 في القدس، فلسطين وتقيم في بيروت، لبنان.
poha.contents: Socio-economic and political conditions in the city. (@ 0:00)||Political turmoil, immigration and exile. (@ 7:46)||Revisiting Palestine. (@ 22:20)||Refugees, aid and living conditions. (@ 30:23)
